document.heading: Bill to Designate Authorized Organizational Representative for the ANA SEDS Grant
document.preamble: At a duly called Meeting of the Council held this 28th day of March 2024, the following Bill was adopted.

recital.text: the Council of the Upper Mattaponi Tribe (the "Tribe"), whose address is 13476 King William RD, King William, Virginia, 23086-3401, was awarded an Administration for Native Americans (ANA) Social and Economic Development Strategies (SEDS) Grant for a Tribal Project entitled Sovereign Promise: Realizing the Upper Mattaponi Future; and
the ANA requires the designation of an Authorized Organizational Representative (AOR) for oversight of and communications regarding the ANA SEDS Grant,; and
the current listed AOR is no longer employed by the Tribe; and
THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, the Council hereby approves the designation of an AOR for the ANA SEDS grant; and

recital.conjunction: NOW THEREFORE BE IT FINALLY RESOLVED,
recital.text: the Council authorizes Chief W. Frank Adams to be its Authorized Organization Representative (AOR), for ANA SEDS Grant Tribal Project entitled Sovereign Promise: Realizing the Upper Mattaponi Future.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on March 28, 2024, at a Special Called Meeting with a vote of 6 in favor and 0 opposed, 0 abstaining, and 1 absent, pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Constitution of the Tribe.
